member.name: F:WebSharper.UI.Next.Templating.LegacyMode.Old
member.summary: Use the templating syntax inherited from WebSharper 3

member.name: F:WebSharper.UI.Next.Templating.LegacyMode.Both
member.summary: Both old and new-style template construction methods are generated, warnings on old syntax

member.name: F:WebSharper.UI.Next.Templating.ServerLoad.WhenChanged
member.summary: The HTML file is watched for changes and reloaded accordingly.

member.name: F:WebSharper.UI.Next.Templating.ServerLoad.PerRequest
member.summary: The HTML is loaded from the file system on every use.

member.name: F:WebSharper.UI.Next.Templating.ServerLoad.Once
member.summary: The HTML is loaded from the file system on first use.

member.name: T:WebSharper.UI.Next.Templating.ServerLoad
member.summary: Decide how the HTML is loaded when the template is used on the server side. This only has an effect when passing a path to the provider, not inline HTML. (default: Once)

member.name: F:WebSharper.UI.Next.Templating.ClientLoad.FromDocument
member.summary: The HTML is loaded from the current document.

member.name: F:WebSharper.UI.Next.Templating.ClientLoad.Inline
member.summary: The HTML is built into the compiled JavaScript.

member.name: T:WebSharper.UI.Next.Templating.ClientLoad
member.summary: Decide how the HTML is loaded when the template is used on the client side. This only has an effect when passing a path to the provider, not inline HTML. (default: Inline)

member.name: P:WebSharper.UI.Next.Templating.Parsing.WrappedTemplateName.NameAsOption
member.summary: None is the root template, Some x is a child template.

member.name: P:WebSharper.UI.Next.Templating.Parsing.WrappedTemplateName.IdAsOption
member.summary: None is the root template, Some x is a child template.

member.name: M:WebSharper.UI.Next.Templating.Parsing.WrappedTemplateName.OfOption(Microsoft.FSharp.Core.FSharpOption{System.String})
member.summary: None is the root template, Some x is a child template.

member.name: M:WebSharper.UI.Next.Templating.Parsing.Impl.getParts(Microsoft.FSharp.Core.FSharpFunc{System.String,Microsoft.FSharp.Core.FSharpFunc{WebSharper.UI.Next.Templating.AST.HoleKind,Microsoft.FSharp.Core.Unit}},System.String)
